Make an example fucntion
```{r}
ghg<- function(element, kg){
  
  if(element == "carbon"){
    return(5.077*kg)
    
    } 
  else if(element == "nitrogen"){
    return(624.643*kg)
  }
  
  else if (element == "methane"){return(37.333*kg)}
}

ghg("carbon", kg = 1)

ghg("nitrogen", kg = 2)

ghg("methane", kg = 5)
```

```{r}
ghg<- function(element, kg){
  
 element<- c("carbon"[5.077], "nitrogen"[624.643], "methane"[37.333])
 ghg = "element"*kg
 
  return(ghg)
}

ghg("carbon", 13)
```
